quotes.quote: We shall find peace. We shall hear the angels, we shall see the sky sparkling with diamonds.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: We make war that we may live in peace.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Peace is not an absence of war, it is a virtue, a state of mind, a disposition for benevolence, confidence, justice.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: For peace is not mere absence of war, but is a virtue that springs from the force of character.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: At present the peace of the world has been preserved, not by statesmen, but by capitalists.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: Peace has never come from dropping bombs. Real peace comes from enlightenment and educating people to behave more in a divine manner.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: The name of peace is sweet, and the thing itself is beneficial, but there is a great difference between peace and servitude. Peace is freedom in tranquillity, servitude is the worst of all evils, to be resisted not only by war, but even by death.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: I like to believe that people in the long run are going to do more to promote peace than our governments. Indeed, I think that people want peace so much that one of these days governments had better get out of the way and let them have it.
quotes.author: Flavius Vegetius Renatus

quotes.quote: Yes, God and the politicians willing, the United States can declare peace upon the world, and win it.
quotes.author: George C. Marshall

quotes.quote: Let him who desires peace prepare for war.
quotes.author: Hermocrates of Syracuse

quotes.quote: If man does find the solution for world peace it will be the most revolutionary reversal of his record we have ever known.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: Has not peace honours and glories of her own unattended by the dangers of war?
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: Peace is not a relationship of nations. It is a condition of mind brought about by a serenity of soul. Peace is not merely the absence of war. It is also a state of mind. Lasting peace can come only to peaceful people.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: The only alternative to coexistence is codestruction.
quotes.author: Moshe Dayan

quotes.quote: You can't separate peace from freedom because no one can be at peace unless he has his freedom.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: If you want to make peace, you don't talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: If you want peace, stop fighting. If you want peace of mind, stop fighting with your thoughts.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: Every day we do things, we are things that have to do with peace. If we are aware of our life..., our way of looking at things, we will know how to make peace right in the moment, we are alive.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: First keep the peace within yourself, then you can also bring peace to others.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Peace with all nations, and the right which that gives us with respect to all nations, are our object.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: That peace, safety, and concord may be the portion of our native land, and be long enjoyed by our fellow-citizens, is the most ardent wish of my heart, and if I can be instrumental in procuring or preserving them, I shall think I have not lived in vain.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: One cannot find peace in work or in pleasure, in the world or in a convent, but only in one's soul.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Tao. Some of us look for the Way in opium and some in God, some of us in whiskey and some in love. It is all the same Way and it leads nowhither.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Peace is an unstable equilibrium, which can be preserved only by acknowledged supremacy or equal power.
The peace of heaven is theirs that lift their swords, in such a just and charitable war.
Only a peace between equals can last. Only a peace the very principle of which is equality and a common participation in a common benefit.
